CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard for Watermark meeting (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Watermark enabled
Microsoft Teams meetings will now support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard to
also be watermarked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
CurrentVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
OldVersion.description: Increase transparency by viewing a user's OKRs from Viva Goals within a Live People Card in Outlook

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
OldVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention – Restrict egress activities when accessing sensitive websites in Microsoft Edge (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: This capability allows restricting common egress activities as users navigate protected sites or access sensitive content via Microsoft Edge. With this new capability, organizations will be able to designate groups of protected sites and apply different restrictions, and monitor or restrict common egress activities when users visit protected sites with audit, block, and block override controls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention – Restrict egress activities when accessing sensitive websites in Microsoft Edge (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: This capability allows restricting common egress activities as users navigate protected sites or access sensitive content via Microsoft Edge. With this new capability, organizations will be able to designate groups of protected sites and apply different restrictions, and monitor or restrict common egress activities when users visit protected sites with audit, block, and block override controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: meeting participants time-zone
CurrentVersion.description:
When scheduling a meeting with people from
different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and
additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone,
ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: meeting participants time-zone
OldVersion.description:
When scheduling a meeting with people from
different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and
additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone,
ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
OldVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified channel creation
CurrentVersion.description:
We
added the option to create a channel directly from the + button in the Teams
app, making it easier for the user to create a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified team create
CurrentVersion.description:
When
creating a team, the new default experience will be ‘create a team from
scratch’, making it a simpler and quicker experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified team create
OldVersion.description:
When
creating a team, the new default experience will be ‘create a team from
scratch’, making it a simpler and quicker experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description:
Containers are a powerful tool for organizing
and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2
license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create
professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description:
Containers are a powerful tool for organizing
and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2
license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create
professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat between multi-tenant organization contacts will default to external chat
CurrentVersion.description:
1:1 chat between
multi-tenant organization (MTO) contacts will now default to external chat,
creating a single conversation thread. As part of this change, existing B2B
chat threads will be available as read-only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat between multi-tenant organization contacts will default to external chat
OldVersion.description:
1:1 chat between
multi-tenant organization (MTO) contacts will now default to external chat,
creating a single conversation thread. As part of this change, existing B2B
chat threads will be available as read-only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
OldVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Admin policy for enabling/disabling tenant users to join externally hosted meetings
CurrentVersion.description: As an admin, you can control which meetings your org users can attend - only internally hosted meetings or externally hosted meetings as well. This can help your org to meet compliance needs and strengthen controls around Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
OldVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Coaching by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Coaching by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Draft by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can now help you draft new messages or replies.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Draft by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can now help you draft new messages or replies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365  in Teams Chat list
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 app is available in the Teams Apps Store for Copilot licensed users. This update will make the Copilot app visible in the Teams Chat list for easy access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365  in Teams Chat list
OldVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 app is available in the Teams Apps Store for Copilot licensed users. This update will make the Copilot app visible in the Teams Chat list for easy access.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Admin apps pinned by default in Mail Compose and Read
CurrentVersion.description:
When an app is deployed in
Integrated Apps (Get Apps & Upload Custom LOB apps) in the Microsoft Admin
Center, it will be available in Outlook on the web in Read Message Actions and
Compose Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center:  Group Driven Membership Management
CurrentVersion.description: With this in-product feature support, end users and admins will be able to add other groups as member of a Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group by using the memberOf property. In the preview, users will be able to create these GDM a.k.a nested groups from Azure Portal & Group Card and they can be accessed & used like any other Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group across apps like Teams, Outlook & SharePoint. Enhancements around deeper levels of nesting, increasing the number of memberOf groups in a tenant are also being worked on and will be eventually available for GA.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center:  Group Driven Membership Management
OldVersion.description: With this in-product feature support, end users and admins will be able to add other groups as member of a Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group by using the memberOf property. In the preview, users will be able to create these GDM a.k.a nested groups from Azure Portal & Group Card and they can be accessed & used like any other Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group across apps like Teams, Outlook & SharePoint. Enhancements around deeper levels of nesting, increasing the number of memberOf groups in a tenant are also being worked on and will be eventually available for GA.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Location-based routing for Teams on VDI
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will be delivered as part of VDI 2.0.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Location-based routing for Teams on VDI
OldVersion.description:
When making or receiving a PSTN call,
location-based routing for Teams on VDI, enables the bypass of toll
restrictions based on where the user is located. Such as when the user is not
physically located on a corporate network.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manual course completion
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can mark a course as complete in Viva
learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manual course completion
OldVersion.description:
Users can mark a course as complete in Viva
learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard for Watermark meeting (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Watermark enabled
Microsoft Teams meetings will now support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard to
also be watermarked.

CurrentVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).
